text: hello I'm David Pogue in my New York
Times column this week I reviewed what
might look like ordinary cell phones
well some of them look ordinary some of
them look more like I don't know Star
Trek communicators and others resemble
museum pieces but in any case all these
have one thing in common they're meant
to be a cell phone for your kid and the
point is that they have GPS track
ability so at any time I can go to a
website or sometimes even from my cell
phone and see where my kid is accurate
within about 20 yards I can imagine that
this feature would make a lot of parents
feel more comfortable about giving their
kid a cell phone for the first time
let's see what would it be like if I
gave my son one of these Kelly you're
now nine years old your mom and I have
been talking about this and we think
you're ready for this your very first
cell phone now with great coverage comes
great responsibility and we want you to
know that we're going to be able to
track you wherever you go with this
phone alright do you think you can
handle the challenge yes good my son go
forth and communicate
now it turns out the pricing for this
service is all over the map this where
fi phone costs you only one minute of
talk time every time you want to check
your kids location this one from
guardian angel it's thirty dollars a
month on top of your voice plan and also
it turns out that both sprint and
verizon offer child cell phone tracking
for an additional ten dollars a month it
works only with certain cell phones it's
also worth noting there's something else
all over the map the maps some of them
show you aerial photos others show you
only the street names some of them let
you show breadcrumbs as your kid moves
about the city I found that the tracking
feature works really well the phone does
have to be turned on but if it is you
can get a fix on it even if it's in a
car or in somebody's house it doesn't
need a direct line of sight to the sky
all told I think this is a great new
technology and it should give parents a
lot of peace of mind for the first time
you'll always know exactly where your
child is hey Kelly you wanna come to the
ice cream shop yeah well I have the cell
phone that will tell my parents where I
am so they'll know that I'm at the ice
cream shop oh balma wait here comes the
car I've got an idea

excuse me what's the time
it's seven-thirty should be and then

oh yeah my parents will reach good okay
